article_title: "For What Did We Throw Off The Yoke Of Britain And Call Ourselves Independent?"

article_metadata.author: Clyde Wayne Crews Jr.

og.description: Well, everybody's back from the beach or the lake, we're done with our hot dogs and picnics and fireworks. We're all back in our workplaces and offices. Well, unfortunately not everyone; a recent Bureau of Labor Statistics report finds 92 million Americans not participating in the labor force; meanwhile much of [...]
